The various mechanisms of action that botanical therapies can elicit on HSV give them potential to have beneficial effects on prophylaxis and treatment of the infection. Particularly, some have demonstrated strong antiviral activity that acts at various stages of viral growth.
23 Natural remedies also have fewer side effects, less resistance to medications, and lower toxicity than pharmacological treatments.
23 For these reasons, many botanicals have been studied for their effects on HSV.
